titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Csaba Horvath, Chairman of the Department of Chemical Engineering, Yale University, Records
Horvath (Csaba), Chairman of the Department of Chemical Engineering, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:38

did.unittitle: Csaba Horvath, chairman of the Department of Chemical Engineering, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of subject files and reports maintained by Csaba Horvath, chair of the Yale Department of Chemical Engineering. The records document departmental affairs, undergraduate chemical engineering courses, and graduate students.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Department of Chemical Engineering

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic departments and programs of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Yale Department of Chemical Engineering, 2004

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See inventory for details

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Csaba Horvath, Chairman of the Department of Chemical Engineering, Yale University, Records (RU 973). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by topic

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of subject files and reports maintained by Csaba Horvath, chair of the Yale Department of Chemical Engineering. The records document departmental affairs, undergraduate chemical engineering courses, and graduate students
